aiWebsiteExtraction.testResult: Successfully extracted AI Lead Strategies business info from aileadstrategies.com

Environment variable priority: API_URL > NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL > hardcoded

messagingUpdates: Emphasize 'Sign up in 30 seconds' - down from 3-5 minutes
Showcase 'AI reads your website' - paste URL, instant business profile
Highlight zero-friction onboarding vs competitor lengthy forms
LeadSite.AI differentiator: AI-powered website analysis at signup
